answers.answer: Hi,How is your wife? Are there other symptoms present?  Aside from Reynaud's, fingers that change color may be caused by  Buerger's disease, chilblains, Cryoglobulinemia, necrotizing vasculitis, scleroderma, SLE and peripheral artery disease.  Further evaluation may need to be done including complete blood count, blood differential, antinuclear antibody blood test and even x-ray of the hands. Take care and do keep us posted.
